name: LG Gram Intel Evo 11th Gen Core i7 17 inches Ultra-Light Laptop
description: LG gram is newly engineered to increase your productivity with a 16:10 professional display, productivity-enhancing design and powerful processors, while remaining faithful to its lightweight body. So you can get heavy work done anytime, anywhere.
